mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ht_borrow b LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON b.borrow_nid = bi.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_asset_borrowtype habt ON b.project_type = habt.borrow_cd AND bi.inst_code = habt.inst_code AND bi.asset_type = habt.asset_type AND habt.is_open = 1 LEFT JOIN ht_r_user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id

SELECT FORMAT(SUM(b.account), 2) AS accountSum FROM ht_borrow b LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON b.borrow_nid = bi.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_asset_borrowtype habt ON b.project_type = habt.borrow_cd AND bi.inst_code = habt.inst_code AND bi.asset_type = habt.asset_type AND habt.is_open = 1
